com.adobe.acs.commons.forms.helpers

Interface FormHelper

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ForwardAsGetFormHelper, PostFormHelper, PostRedirectGetFormHelper

    public interface FormHelper

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getAction(com.day.cq.wcm.api.Page page)
      Builds the form's action URI based on the provided page's path Appends ".html//" to the page's path.

      Builds the form's action URI based on the provided page's path Appends ".html//" to the page's path.

      Builds the form's action URI based on the provided resource's path Appends ".html/" to the resource's path.

      Builds the form's action URI based on the provided path Appends ".html/" to the path.

      Builds the form's action URI based on the provided path Appends ".html//" to the path.

      Gets the From from either the POST Requests parameters or the GET request's (synthetic) attributes.
      String getFormInputsHTML(Form form, String... keys)
      Returns a series of hidden fields used to persist multi-page form data between forms.

      Gets the Form Selector for the form POST request

      Wrapped method to create a interface from FormHelper to normalize APIs that are commonly used.
